code: class  Solution  {   public :   vector < int >  findWordsContaining ( vector < string >&  words ,  char  x )  {   vector < int >  ans ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  words . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( words [ i ]. find ( x )  !=  string :: npos )   ans . push_back ( i );   return  ans ;   }  };
